title: ExCALIBUR Fusion Modelling System: Finite Element Models Performance
summary: This report describes preliminary evaluations of the Nektar++-based NEPTUNE proxyapps (Nektar-Diffusion and Nektar-Driftwave) for simulating diffusion problems and Hasegawa-Wakatani equations, respectively. It also includes a discussion of Soldrake, a one-dimensional continuum model of the scrape-off layer implemented in Firedrake software.
